title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 §§ 398-14.1 - File retention and maintenance
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 §§ 398-14.1 - File retention and maintenance

State Regulations

Information and data collected in the Office's
administration of the SSP and SSPNA programs will be maintained for the
appropriate time period as determined by the State archives and in a manner, that supports the Office's operational needs and internal controls, protects
privacy, and meets federal and State requirements. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18
§§
398-14.1

Adopted by

New

York State Register September 24, 2014/Volume XXXVI, Issue 38, eff. 10/1/2014. Amended

New

York State Register January 13, 2021/Volume XLIII, Issue 02, eff. 1/13/2021

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
